TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ToggleButton extends System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase

summary.span: 可切换状态的控件基类，例如 。

span.span: Base class for controls that can switch states, such as .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是 ，这意味着它可以包含任何类型的单个对象 (例如字符串、图像或面板) 。A is a , which means that it can contain a single object of any type (such as a string, an image, or a panel). 有关更多信息，请参见 类。For more information, see the class. 属性指定的状态 。The property specifies the state of the . 属性指定是否 有两种或三种状态。The property specifies whether the has two or three states. ## 自定义切换按钮控件Customizing the ToggleButton Control 若要对多个控件应用相同的属性设置 ，请使用 属性。To apply the same property settings to multiple controls, use the property. 您可以修改默认值 ，为控件指定独特的外观。You can modify the default to give the control a unique appearance. 有关创建的详细信息 ，请参阅 [通过创建 System.windows.controls.controltemplate> 自定义现有控件的外观](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control)。For more information about creating a , see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control). 若要查看特定于的部分和状态 ，请参阅 [切换按钮样式和模板](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/togglebutton-styles-and-templates)。To see the parts and states that are specific to the , see [ToggleButton Styles and Templates](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/togglebutton-styles-and-templates). 此控件的依赖属性可能由控件的默认样式设置。Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control's default style. 如果按默认样式设置属性，则当控件出现在应用程序中时，属性可能会更改为默认值。If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application. 默认样式取决于应用程序运行时使用的桌面主题。The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [默认的 WPF 主题](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252)。For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252). [!INCLUDE[setting-a-visual-property](~/includes/visual-property-note.md)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Property IsChecked As Nullable(Of Boolean)
public: property Nullable<bool> IsChecked { Nullable<bool> get(); void set(Nullable<bool> value); };
member this.IsChecked : Nullable<bool> with get, set

span.span: Gets or sets whether the is checked.

value.span: 如果 已选中，则为 ；如果 未选中，则为 false；否则为 。

span.span: if the is checked; false if the is unchecked; otherwise .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 从继承的控件 在此属性为时确定其行为 `null` 。A control that inherits from determines its behavior when this property is `null`. ## CheckBoxCheckBox 当 属性设置为 true 时，用户可以单击 来选择三个可能的状态。When the property is set to true, a user can click a to pick three possible states. 下表描述了的三个状态 。The following table describes the three states of a . |的状态 State of the | 的值Value of | |------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| |已选中Checked|`true`| |未选中Unchecked|`false`| |尚Indeterminate|`null`| 如果 为 false，则仍可通过编程方式将此属性设置为 `null` 以使 处于不确定状态，但用户无法通过将设置 为不确定状态 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] 。If is false, you can still programmatically set this property to `null` to put the in an indeterminate state, but the user cannot set the to the indeterminate state through the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]. ## RadioButtonRadioButton 如果将此属性设置为 `null` on ，则 不会被选中。If you set this property to `null` on a , the is unchecked. ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage <*对象* `IsChecked`= " "/><*object* `IsChecked`=""/> - 或 --or- <*对象* `IsChecked`= "{[X:Null 标记扩展](/dotnet/framework/xaml-services/x-null-markup-extension)}"/><*object* `IsChecked`="{[x:Null Markup Extension](/dotnet/framework/xaml-services/x-null-markup-extension)}"/> ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|| ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个 设置为不确定状态的。The following example creates a set to an indeterminate state. [!code-xaml[CheckBox_Snippets#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CheckBox_Snippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#1)]
